owner_summaries.key_concerns: Entity-level TB balances not zeroed, high flux analysis exceptions

residual_risks.description: High number of flux analysis exceptions indicating potential reporting inaccuracies
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement tighter variance thresholds and enhance review procedures

residual_risks.description: Bank duplicate detection exceptions indicate potential cash management inefficiencies
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Enhance duplicate detection algorithms and conduct regular audits
